content.default: :warning: We do not have any records of this user
content.description: This messages gets send if someone checks a profile of a user when the user never send a message
Embed which gets send if !profile gets executed
This embed gets send if !leaderboard (!lb) gets executed

default.title: Leaderboard
default.description: You can find the level of every user here
default.x_levels_are_not_shown: And **%count% Level** are not being displayed
default.you_are_level_x_with_x_xp: You are currently on **Level %level%** with **%xp% XP**. See more with `/profile`.

content.default: Level Up! Your new level is **%newLevel%**!
content.description: This messages gets send if a user levels up (gets overwritten if randomMessages is enabled)

content.default: Level Up! Your new level is **%newLevel%**! You received %role%.
content.description: This messages gets send if a user levels up and gets a role (gets overwritten if randomMessages is enabled)
Embed which gets send to the leaderboard-channel and gets updated

default.title: Live Leaderboard
default.description: Find all the users levels here. Updated every five minutes.
